def generate_acronym(disliked_words, sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word in disliked_words]
    acronym_chars = [word[0].upper() for word in filtered_words]
    acronym = '.'.join(acronym_chars)
    return acronym
